Class: ForwardedMessage

ForwardedMessage

A message which contains a forwarded message

Constructor

new ForwardedMessage(message, API)

Creates a new ForwardedMessage object
Parameters:
Name Type Description
message Object A raw message object from an update
API BotAPI An instance of a BotAPI from teleapiwrapper which will be used to do stuff with this message

  • message_types/forwarded_message.js, line 18
